name: EventRelation
description: Represents a relationship between an event and another object, such as a contact or lead.
summary: The {EventRelation} object in the Salesforce application represents the relationship between events and related records. It has attributes such as Id (unique identifier), RelationId (reference to related record), EventId (reference to event), Status (picklist value), RespondedDate (date and time of response), Response (textual response), CreatedDate (date and time of creation), CreatedById (reference to creator), LastModifiedDate (date and time of last modification), LastModifiedById (reference to last modifier), SystemModstamp (date and time of system modification), and IsDeleted (boolean indicating if the record is deleted).
label: Event Relation
